mode.title: Execution Mode
mode.description: Choose what type of monitoring to perform

profileId.title: Resource Profile ID
profileId.description: ID of the resource profile to execute (required for profile mode)

customUrls.title: Custom URLs (one per line)
customUrls.description: URLs to monitor, separated by newlines (for custom mode)

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: Start date for the reporting period (YYYY-MM-DD)

endDate.title: End Date
endDate.description: End date for the reporting period (YYYY-MM-DD)

includeDownloads.title: Include Downloads
includeDownloads.description: Whether to download and process PDF/DOCX files

allowedDomains.title: Allowed Domains (one per line)
allowedDomains.description: Domains to include, separated by newlines (empty = all AWS domains)

generateDigest.title: Generate Intelligence Digest
generateDigest.description: Whether to generate a human-readable digest

outputFormats.title: Output Formats
outputFormats.description: Comma-separated list of formats: text, html, pdf, json

includeRawData.title: Include Raw Data
includeRawData.description: Whether to include raw extracted content in output
